## SECTION 7: Summary Financials (Consolidated) - Comprehensive Analysis

### Financial Summary

Fu Yu Corporation Limited's consolidated financial performance for the last two financial years (FY2023, FY2024) and the most recent four interim periods (1H2023, 2H2023, 1H2024, 2H2024) reveals a company in transition, navigating a challenging economic landscape while undertaking strategic shifts. The Group's decision to cease its supply chain management services segment in late FY2024 significantly impacts the consolidated figures, leading to a re-presentation of prior period financials to separate continuing and discontinued operations. This analysis incorporates both GAAP (e.g., Net Income) and non-GAAP (e.g., EBITDA) measures to provide a comprehensive view of performance.
